Gold And Platinum Monster Hunter Sculptures For Only $81,000 Each
01 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Brian Ashcraft


Screenshot: U-TREASURE

If you are in the market for Monster Hunter sculpture and have lots of money to spend, have I got two items for you!
Created to celebrate Monster Hunter’s 15th anniversary, here is a Gold Rathian, made from 24K gold, and a Silver Rathalos, made from Platinum. Each is 8,800,000 yen ($US81,462 ($118,262)) or you can buy both for a cool 16,500,000 yen ($US152,741 ($221,741)).



Famitsu points out that there are cheaper versions: a Gold Rathian made from silver and covered in a yellow gold coating as well as a Silver Rathalos made from, well, silver. Priced each at 880,000 yen ($US8,146 ($11,826)).
